testcase.name: testByXPathAndContainsStringMethod

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected: an XML document with XPath CUSTOMER/FIRSTNAME a string containing "Sue" Actual: <?xml version="1.0" standalone="no"?><CUSTOMER xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"> <ID>10</ID> <FIRSTNAME>Sue</FIRSTNAME> <LASTNAME>Fuller</LASTNAME> <STREET>135 Upland Pl.</STREET> <CITY>Dallas</CITY> </CUSTOMER>

testcase.failure:
